Title: Search flight by place and date
Steps:
1. Navigate to flight search page
2. Enter departure and arrival locations
3. Select departure date
4. Click on 'Search Flights' button
Expected Result: List of available flights is displayed with costs

Title: Select a flight and pick a seat
Steps:
1. Search for flights
2. Select a flight from the list
3. Choose a seat from the seat map
4. Click on 'Continue' button
Expected Result: Seat selection is confirmed and proceeds to payment

Title: Successful payment with card
Steps:
1. Select a flight and seat
2. Enter valid card details
3. Click on 'Pay Now' button
Expected Result: Payment is processed successfully and booking confirmation is displayed

Title: Payment failure due to invalid card
Steps:
1. Select a flight and seat
2. Enter invalid card details
3. Click on 'Pay Now' button
Expected Result: Error message is displayed indicating payment failure

Title: Retry payment after failure
Steps:
1. Select a flight and seat
2. Enter invalid card details
3. Click on 'Pay Now' button
4. Enter valid card details
5. Click on 'Pay Now' button
Expected Result: Payment is processed successfully after retry and booking confirmation is displayed

Title: Email confirmation after successful booking
Steps:
1. Select a flight and seat
2. Enter valid card details
3. Click on 'Pay Now' button
4. Check email inbox

Title: Search flight with no results
Steps:
1. Navigate to flight search page
2. Enter invalid departure and arrival locations
3. Select departure date
4. Click on 'Search Flights' button
Expected Result: No flights found message is displayed

Title: Check seat selection availability
Steps:
1. Search for flights
2. Select a flight
3. Check seat map for available seats
Expected Result: Available seats are displayed for selection
